title: Blitz mid games

embed.description: Just a normal game against akali trolling around. Remember to all chat you are lagging for mega fisting! Happy trolling Bullshit really starts happening around 13:51

body: Dont even worry about farm. get what you can reach. use your passives to your advantage and even you can smash an akali mid! and then their whole team! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BFXgbequzhc&t=20s{{champion:53}}
